name: Dinemore (Marine Drive)
description: Dinemore in Wellawatte by the sea has got their signature oozing-mayo subs and burgers, with a relaxing view of the ocean.
tip: Always go upstairs. If you're going around Ramadan time then go way before 6PM to be able to get an upstairs table.
review:
Dinemore in Wellawatte by the sea has got their signature oozing-mayo subs and burgers, with a relaxing view of the ocean.

ඒ වුනාට Dinemore sub නම් කොච්චර කෑවත් මේ දුන්නොත් මේ කන්න පුළුවන් Sub ජාතියක් තමයි.
